reviewText: This is worth the money if you don't have someone to teach you.  I had been wakeboarding for a couple of years (nothing fancy), but this helped me to learn a few tips and tricks.  It would even be helpful for someone who has never wakeboarded before.

As a first time female "wakeboarder", the book has helped many of our nephews and nieces get up and ride their first time.  As a female rider many of the dvd's are extremely helpful for a beginner.  My husband has been riding for two years and thinks the DVD's are great. When we go out on the boat I hear him using the exact descriptions from the Book to friends.
